channel.title: Generation-Pkz (LOOKING FOR TEAM)
channel.description:
Hello, my name is Anthony. Im currently looking for a decent staff team so i can start running my server and everything is smooth. Im currently looking for 2 coders. Not any bad coders. What i mean by coder's, this is what they should be able to code:
- objects adding - commands - client coding - interfaces (client sided) - And basically most of the basic things.
This also includes understanding the codes.
The Server?:
The server is a spawn-server named Generation-Pkz by me. I also need Moderator's And Administrator's, but thats coming later. The coder's will receive admin ingame, but if the coder can add a developer icon (client sided) that would be very much appreciated. The coder's will also get money if they stay with me, i can only pay you once i get donations since im with 0 atm. But ill be accepting rsgp donations so we can share that.
Some pictures:
[img]http://i42.tinypic.com/10x5vza.png[/img] [img]http://i44.tinypic.com/xeh5pg.png[/img] [img]http://i39.tinypic.com/20u8zko.png[/img] [img]http://i43.tinypic.com/9vf66a.png[/img]
If your interested and want to know more details, my msn: jiglowaypk@hotmail.com
About forums ill be making them, im experienced with that, i do code server-sided, but the simple things, like commands/objects/ etc..
To apply add me on msn and post with this format:
[b]NOTE: the server is already portforwarded and will be online extremely soon. [/b] [code] - Name: - Age: - Msn: - Applying for: - Experience:[/code]
